name: Using express as a plugin?
details: I am finding very useful to make use of adapter functions so you can write plain TypeScript (JavaScript) controllers and use them in express without compromising them.

name: SNICallback native
details: Today we do not have native support for such functionality. I myself, in a current project, needed SNICallback and I only found it in NodeJS native https functions but I didn't find any direct implementation in ExpressJS where I would rather have a raised server.

name: POST request causing PreFlight and then getting cancelled after stalling
details: I wrote a simple API for learning using express, when I try to send a POST request from POSTMAN it is carried out and returns a success message but when POST is sent from client, PreFlight is issued and POST request after being stalled gets cancelled, after which PreFlight does return success message.

name: Improve the Stack Trace when an HTML Parsing Error is Encountered
details: Introduce an option that suppresses all errors in a stack trace except for the first one when the error is caused by a malformed HTML element (syntax error).

name: [Feature Request] Currency Pipe: improved digit info options
details: A common way to display currencies (at least in US) is to omit the cents if the price is a round number, or to show two digits if the price is not a round number.
